description.raw:
requires `citysim` branch in gazebo

Note, I had to update various ign-* repos' dependencies to get gazebo's citysim branch with ign-msgs1 + ign-math4 working. We probably want to create a new branch in each ign repos to track these changes.

To test, source the setup file and run rendering.world:

    source [install_prefix]/share/citysim/setup.sh
    gazebo --verbose worlds/rendering.world


shiny grey material + bloom effect:
![bloom.jpg](data/bitbucket.org/repo/RLzBkE/images/3647211616-bloom.jpg)

view with lensflare effect
![lensflare.jpg](data/bitbucket.org/repo/RLzBkE/images/2580265865-lensflare.jpg)

The level of bloom effect can be configured (to some extent)
